name: Radiation Side Effects
text: Give to the Angelica Jones player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: * Exhaust Angelica Jones and take 2 damage → remove Radiation Side Effects from the game. * Take 3 damage. Discard this obligation.

name: Subverting Propaganda
text: Judas Traveller's incessant propaganda is inciting violence. Firestar can't blow her cover until she's sabotaged his operation. Firestar cannot attack. Interrupt: When Firestar would thwart this scheme, remove 1 additional threat from here.

flavor: “Every word out of his mouth makes my skin crawl.” —Firestar
name: Judas Traveller
text: Forced Interrupt: When Firestar attacks, Judas Traveler activates. (Firestar's nemesis minion.)

name: Keeping Up Appearances
text: Attach to Firestar or Angelica Jones. Forced Interrupt: When Firestar would attack, deal that damage to a friendly character instead. Discard this card.
